tasks.label: dotnet clean+build (Debug x64)
args: Set-Location '${workspaceFolder}'; dotnet clean .\MicrophoneManager.sln -v minimal -p:Platform=x64; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; dotnet build .\MicrophoneManager.sln -c Debug -v minimal -p:Platform=x64

tasks.label: publish single-file (win-x64)
args: & { Set-Location '${workspaceFolder}'; dotnet publish .\MicrophoneManager.WinUI\MicrophoneManager.WinUI.csproj -c Release -p:PublishProfile=win-x64-singlefile; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Copy-Item -Path '.\MicrophoneManager.WinUI\bin\Release\net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0\win-x64\publish\MicrophoneManager.WinUI.exe' -Destination 'D:\utils\MicrophoneManager.exe' -Force; Write-Host 'Copied to D:\utils\MicrophoneManager.exe' -ForegroundColor Green } }
